amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 101 from the bill which provides authorization for Amtrak.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 272 (Roll no. 110).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 272 (Roll no. 110).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. McClintock.
